original_text: Lie thou also upon thy left side, and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel upon it: according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon it thou shalt bear their iniquity.
korean_text: 너는 또 왼쪽으로 누워 이스라엘 족속의 죄악을 짊어지되 네가 눕는 날수대로 그 죄악을 담당할지니라

sentences.original_text: Lie thou also upon thy left side
and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel upon it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 족속의 죄악을 그 위에 두라

sentences.original_text: according to the number of the days
that thou shalt lie upon it
